title: Training doesn't continue from snapshot prefix
body:
I lost my access to the server and training was stopped before reaching 1M iteration. I wanted to use my last snapshot however, it starts from iteration 10. Could you please let me know what I might be missing?

I changed this in config.yaml: snapshotindex: 426600 previously it was -1

I also changed this in pose_cfg.yaml:
init_weights: /projectnb/ivcgroup/jalal/mouse10k/openfield-filtered/dlc-models/iteration-0/openfieldDec4-trainset95shuffle1/train/snapshot-426600


However, it still keeps starting from the beginning and iteration 0. 

